Voice Journal Icon Generator

This page will help generate the required PWA icons. For now, you can use the SVG icon as a base.

Required Icon Sizes:

  • 72x72px
  • 96x96px
  • 128x128px
  • 144x144px
  • 152x152px
  • 192x192px
  • 384x384px
  • 512x512px

Note: You can use online tools like RealFaviconGenerator or Favicon Generator to convert the SVG to different PNG sizes.

For now, the app will work with the SVG icon, but for full PWA functionality, you'll need the PNG versions.
